headline: Enphase EV Charging Update Tests Valuation And Long Term Growth Story
summary: Enphase Energy (NasdaqGM:ENPH) updated the market on its IQ Bidirectional EV Charging Platform. The company reported successful demonstrations across the US and Europe with a range of electric vehicles. Enphase is targeting volume production of the platform in late 2026. For you as an investor, this points to Enphase pushing beyond its core microinverter and battery offerings into bidirectional EV charging, an area that connects home solar, storage, and electric vehicles. The focus on...
